transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Hello? 
Executive: Ma'am good evening. Ma'am Sarang bol raha tha IndiaMART se. Aapse day before yesterday baat hui thi. Wo jo buyleads ko leke concern tha aapko uske liye. Actually mein kal hum low cost pe aapko fir se baat nahi ho payi thi. And us din evening mein maine connect kara tha aapko WhatsApp mein, sir aap busy rahe honge to baat nahi ho payi thi. Ek to ma'am maine na isko aage split kar diya tha hamari jo buylead wali team hai. To waha se bhi jo revert aaya tha na wo to ye tha ki jo particular category hamari hai jaise ek do category ke liye tha main aapko bata deta hu. Ek minute.
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Ek to hamara particular jo CNC tool wala category hai. And dusra cutter wali jo hamari category ke hai. Ispe IndiaMART pe matlab jo leads hai wo kaafi jaldi sold out hoti hai. Kyunki is category ke andar competition IndiaMART pe kaafi jyada hoga. To isme iski jo buylead aapke paas mein jaise kai baar hota hai na ki kam show hoti hongi relevant wali jo aap bata rahe the ki bahut saari relevant to aati hai. And jisko hum wo bhi kar lete hai apne paas se aap not relevant mark karte hi hai. To jo relevant wali hai wo aati to hai but kaafi jaldi wo sold out ho jaati hai jo yaha pe hamari buylead ka team ka kehna tha.
Customer: To isme hamari koi galti nahi hai na sir?
Executive: Nahi nahi aapka nahi hai but isme na aap ye kar sakte hai apne end se jo aap karte bhi honge waise to ki thoda aur jyada active rehne ka. Ki so that matlab as soon as koi buylead aapke paas aaye. Hai na haan haan matlab. Wo kaise to aap aise hi hai wo main dekh raha tha ki aapke end se activity to matlab proper rehti hi hai. And jo buyleads aapke paas aa rahi hai to jitna jaldi aap usko consume karenge utna jyada fir matlab chances hoga relevant wali lead ka kyuki wo jo aati hai but aane ke baad mein wo kaafi jaldi sold out ho ja rahi hai. Is particular category ki cutter wali and jo CNC tool wala hai.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: To yahi matlab uska solution hai ki hum apne end se aur thoda isme active rehne wala jo hai usme aap wo bhi laga sakte hai jo notification wala option aata hai I think wo bhi shayad aapne laga rakha hoga ki jaise koi buylead aaye na alert wala.
Customer: Sir wo to main laga rakha hai. Uska koi problem nahi hai.
Executive: Haan haan.
Executive: To matlab abhi to filhaal matlab jo mere ko na waha se revert mila tha wo yahi wala tha ki is category ki leads kaafi jaldi sold out ho jaati hai. To seller ko hume yahi batana padega ki thoda aur jyada platform pe active rehne ka apne end se. Kyunki matlab aap rehti hai.
Customer: Aur wo to main rehti hu na main aapko wahi bol rahi hu ki jitne bhi aate hai mujhe notification aur jo bhi relevant dikh raha hai to main to wo turant consume kar leti hu usme kuch bhi problem nahi hai. Matlab aap correct nahi de rahe hai mujhe. I am not satisfied with the solution.
Executive: Mere ko actually mein dekhiye yahi waha se revert mila hai jo hamari buylead wala tester hota hai unke paas se iske regarding. Kyunki leads aati hai but aa rahi hongi but wo again wahi hai ki wo sold out ho ja rahi hai. And
Customer: Aate itne irrelevant aaye maine pure hata hai wo irrelevant. Bahut saare hai matlab kuch fayda nahi hai aise aise karke to like mujhe kya ROI milega aapke isme kuch bhi to nahi mil raha mujhe.
Executive: Jo irrelevant matlab wo aapko ye bhi pata hi hai ki haan usko to hum kar hi rahe hai.
Customer: Abhi maine ek aur call kiya tha abhi haan wo unko call kiya tha to wo nahi bol rahe abhi ho abhi sirf aadhe ghante unka kuch bhi aaya tha 3 baje maine 3:30 baje unka call kiya kyuki utha nahi rahe the to unhone uthaya to bole ki nahi ho gaya aadhe ghante mein kaise ho gaya unka pura. Hmm.
Executive: Haan kis kis category ke tha wo wala jo aap bata rahe the?
Customer: Chambering tool ka bhi open kiya tha maine. Accha.
Customer: 50 piece ka unhone bola tha abhi aaya tha requirement. Turant maine open kiya tha uska. Aur
Executive: Matlab within half an hour mein unka kehna hai ki requirement fulfill ho chuki hai already.
Customer: Haan main haan aadhe ghante mein how can they say ki nahi hai. Matlab relevant bhi kuch relevant nahi aa rahe ye bhi main bol rahi hu.
Executive: Haan wo wahi main samajh gaya ki wo aapne bataya hi tha ki jo leads aa rahi hai usme bhi. But jaise abhi maine aapki buylead abhi jaise mere samne open ho rakhi hai. Jo kaafi saari buylead aisi hai jo na aapne maybe ho sakta hai timely consume nahi kari hongi tabhi wo yaha pe show bhi kar raha hai. Otherwise matlab wo yaha se hat hi jaati hai apne wale seller panel pe se.
Customer: Nahi jo nahi hai wo mujhe dikh raha hai wo nahi hai to main kyu open karu samajh mein aa raha hai. Ye to boring tools to hamara nahi hai na boring tools jo hota hai.
Executive: Haan hai na. To iski lead available hai ye Pune Maharashtra se three hours pehle ki. Ye I think ye sahi ho sakti hai business matlab bulk wali hogi most probably ye wali kyuki isme requirement type. Isme maine kyu nahi open kiya ek to buyer se one month se hai usme GST verified hai na WhatsApp hai usme sirf phone hai.
Customer: Haan haan haan. Haan matlab ye aap thik keh rahe ho ki waise isme aapne sahi kara hai waise isko kyuki isme sirf ek email ID aur ye WhatsApp wala number show kar raha hoga. Mobile number hai and WhatsApp number hai. Email ID bhi nahi hai matlab. And uske alawa
Executive: Ab ye niche gaye aur ye sirf cutter hai Godhra Gujarat se.
Customer: Right right right. To kaunsa cutter hai wo bhi nahi hai bataya unhone. Cutter to bahut saare hote hai. Jewellery bhi cutter hote hai.
Executive: Ye wahi hai jo humne discuss kari thi parso bhi ye same wahi wali reflect kar raha hai.
Customer: Cutter what type se hote hai. Aise nahi hai. Hamara CNC tool cutter hai. Jewellery cutter bhi rehta hai. Diamond cutter bhi rehta hai. Bahut rehte hai cutter.
Executive: Haan haan haan.
Executive: Is type mein to actually mein wo baat karke hi matlab clear ho payega ki kyuki ab buyer ne requirement jo post kari hai wo sirf cutter ke naam se daal di yaha pe. To jab tak matlab baat na ho to nahi clear ho payega.
Customer: Fir aap puchiye unko aur solution puchiye iske like I am not matlab mere taraf se to I am not satisfied with the solution. If you can talk aur humse baat direct kijiye unse to main baat karungi.
Executive: Haan maine haan maine nahi actually mein unhone call karwaya tha aapke saath shayad I think call aaya tha us samay shayad aap busy rahe honge to fir call pick nahi ho paya hoga. Afternoon ke aas paas.
Customer: Nahi mujhe nahi aaya call. Primary number pe call kiya na?
Executive: Nahi ye ek friendly number aur hai aapka jo ye I think secondary wala hoga main wo wala number. 97 last mein 940 wala.
Customer: Accha aap ye primary kar dijiye jisse baat kar rahe hai na.
Executive: Accha primary mein isko ye actually mein wo number change ka to wo aap hi kar sakte hai apne end se kyuki OTP jaata hai number change karne mein to wo aap.
Customer: Aur aap unknown number to main uthati nahi hu na isliye mujhe pata nahi chala. Same isi number se aaya hoga IndiaMART likh ke aaya hoga jaise abhi aapke paas mein jo call aaya hai na jis number se aayega same isi number se aaya hoga. To main ab ek baar try kar leta hu although 5:50 ho gaya hai 6 pm tak time hota hai. To agar abhi baat ho jaati hai to thik hai warna kal morning mein ek baar main dobara call back arrange karwata hu fir aapke paas mein.
Executive: Khud bhi kar lijiye mere sir bhi honge us waqt.
Executive: Accha accha thik hai. Thik hai thik hai to main 10:30 ke matlab aas paas aap available honge na morning mein.
Customer: Okay thik hai.
Executive: Thik thik to main morning mein karwata hu. Bye bye okay.
summary:
Concerns:

- Leads for specific categories sold out quickly.

- Irrelevant leads received, affecting ROI.

- Expresses dissatisfaction with the provided solution.



Resolution:

- Executive acknowledged the customer's concerns.

- Suggested being more active on the platform.

- Promised to arrange a call with the relevant team.



Next Steps: 

- Executive will try to connect or arrange call next day.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, category, active, irrelevant
